alert.note: Alert for Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties; Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Little Rockies; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 23 at 10:33AM MDT until July 23 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND STRONG WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 134, 135, 136 AND 137... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Red Flag Warning for low humidity and strong winds for fire weather zones 134, 135, 136 and 137, which is in effect until 9 PM MDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 134 Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties, Fire Weather Zone 135 The Little Rockies, Fire Weather Zone 136 The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge and Fire Weather Zone 137 Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties. * TIMING...Noon through 9pm MDT today. * WINDS...Northwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the 90s. * IMPACTS...Any fire starts could rapidly grow and spread to the southeast today.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties; Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Little Rockies; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge
